lead_paragraph: Top-ranked New Zealand routed Portugal in the Rugby World Cup, 108-13, yesterday in Lyon, France, to continue its strong start. The All Blacks, who beat Italy, 76-14, in their opening game, ran in 16 tries through a record 13 different players.
